    public class CustomerRMIClient

    An implementation for the Customer server interface. (See interface documentation for details on functionality)

        Will create a new loan for the given account after validating the customer's credit line against all banks. (credit line should be inferior or equal to the customer's credit line at this bank, including the new loan)
